author: Vonng (rh@vonng.com)
description: PostgreSQL Monitoring for Remote RDS instances (with limited metrics)

panels.description:
All instances among pgsql cluster ${cls}

Instance: Goto PGSQL Instance

IP: Goto PGSQL Node

Status: Goto PGSQL Service

Load: max(cpu,postgres,pgbouncer)

Space: Disk space usage max(all device)

Proxy: session number, Goto Haproxy Admin Page

Database of this cluster ${cls}

Load: active_time, 1 = 100% 1 core usage 

Conn% : conn usage of instance/database limit

Backend: Postgres num backends

T = is Template?
Leadership shows who is in charge of this cluster ${cls}
panels.title: Leadership

links.title: PGRDS Cluster : Idle in Transaction Conn
PGRDS Cluster : Replication Lag in Bytes
PGRDS Cluster : Replication lag in Seconds

panels.description:
Load, 1 = 100% one cpu core usage.
Calculated by session active time  (PG14+)
Load for Cluster Instances in Last 5 minutes
Alerting event graph. Each stripe represent an alerting Event. Gray transparent stipe are pending alerts.
Transaction Committed & Rollback rate in last 5 minutes on this PostgreSQL Cluster
panels.title: Transaction Commits / Rollbacks (rate5m)

panels.description:
Transaction average response time in last minute.
Calculated by db_active_time / tps. At cluster level / per instance level. Only available on PG14+
panels.title: Transaction RT (1m)

panels.description: Transaction Committed rate in last 1 minute, group on instance level
panels.title: TPS by Instance (rate1m)

panels.description:
Load 1 = 100% one cpu core usage.
Calculated by session active time  (PG14+)
panels.title: Postgres Load (rate1m)

panels.description: Tuples fetched from databases
panels.title: Row Fetched (rate1m)

panels.description: Tuples fetched, inserted, updated, delete among this cluster
panels.title: Row Modified (rate1m)

panels.description:
Cluster lock count by 3 categories:
Read locks, Write Locks, and exclusive locks.
panels.title: Locks by Category

panels.description: Replication Status among cluster ${cls}
Rate of lsn in last minute
panels.title: LSN Progress (rate1m)

panels.description: XID Usage of each instance in this cluster.
panels.title: Age Usage

panels.description: Time spent executing SQL statements in this database
panels.title: Active% (of Session Time)

panels.description: Database 4k blocks access
panels.title: Blocks Access 1m

panels.description: Database 4k blocks hit ratio in last 1 minute
panels.title: Blocks Hit Ratio (1m)

panels.description: Database 4k blocks access
panels.title: Blocks Read 1m

panels.description: Database size on cluster primary
panels.title: Database Size

panels.description: Database Size Change on Cluster Primary in Last 10 minutes
panels.title: Database Size Delta 10m

panels.description: Database Transaction Commit Rate in last 1 minute
panels.title: TPS by Database (rate1m)

panels.description: Active processs for each database in this cluster
panels.title: Session by Database

panels.description: Database 4k blocks hit ratio in last 1 minute
panels.title: Database Blocks Hit Ratio (1m)

panels.description: number of dangerous idle in transaction backend in different database amoung this cluster
panels.title: Idle in Transaction Backends

panels.description:
Connection used ratio of min(
  max_connections @ instance level,
  connlimit @ database level
)
panels.title: Connection Usage

panels.description: Tuples fetched from databases among this cluster
panels.title: Row Fetched

panels.description: Tuples fetched, inserted, updated, delete among this cluster group by database
panels.title: Row Modified

panels.description: Index Scan + Seq Scan on this table per second
panels.title: Table Scan (scan/s)

panels.description: Top Query Time Spent among this cluster
panels.title: Query Time

list.description: Cluster identifier for this postgres instance, cls should be unique among entire environment. such as pg-meta, pg-test
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cls

title: PGRDS Cluster
